data.title: A Girl Plays with a Fancy Doll
data.name: DummyGirl

chapters.title: The Unexpected Gift
chapters.content: Once upon a time, in a little town just outside the kingdom lived a pretty young girl named DummyGirl. She was given a beautifully crafted doll by a benevolent fairy who mistook her for a lost princess. At first, she did not know that the doll was magical but soon realized it after the doll started talking and moving like a real person.
chapters.imagePrompt: a young girl receiving a magical doll from a fairy.
